content.description:
Stand start with right and left hand crimps and a foot on the obvious rail beneath the overhang.  From there, work straight up the slab on sloping crimps and bumps to an easy topout.  The key to this problem involves a technical, left heel hook.

Another option adds a sit start to the problem, which would start from the same point as

Malice of Alice

and finish straight up United Device.  It would definitely add some mileage and likely increase the problem's difficulty.
content.protection: A few pads and a spot, the landing is a little uneven, and there is a large rock behind the problem.
content.location: This is on the South face of Breaching Boulder.

content.description: Sit start below the overhang with a left hand jug and a right hand crimp.  Make a big move out left to the corner crimp, situate your feet, and move up and left on the slab to a solid topout.
content.protection: A few pads and a spot.
content.location: Start out on the east-face overhang, finish on the south-facing slab.
